DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1/2 clinical trial evaluate new combination drug , marizomib ( MRZ ) bevacizumab ( BEV ; Avastin® ) , treatment WHO Grade IV malignant glioma . The study population include subject first second relapse previously receive bevacizumab anti-angiogenic agent proteasome inhibitor treatment malignant glioma . Phase 1 evaluates combination MRZ BEV , Phase 2 evaluate single-agent MRZ .
DOC.brief_title: Stage 1 : Marizomib + Bevacizumab WHO Gr IV GBM ; Stage 2 : Marizomib Alone
